eg.edittools

Interface AddableEditTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExchangeEditor, Finder

    public interface AddableEditTool
    The interface that defines an "edit tool" whose graphical component can be added to the EditToolPanel in the main window
    See Also:
    EditToolPanel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClosingAction(javax.swing.JButton closeBt)
      Adds the action to close the ToolPanel of the main window.
      void end()
      Ends the edit tool.
      void setEditableDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
      Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
      java.awt.Component toolContent()
      Gets the Component that represents the graphical view of the tool

    • Method Detail

      • addClosingAction

        void addClosingAction(javax.swing.JButton closeBt)
        Adds the action to close the ToolPanel of the main window.

        The specified button has got the closing action added and must be shown in the graphical view.

        Parameters:
        closeBt - the closing button

      • toolContent

        java.awt.Component toolContent()
        Gets the Component that represents the graphical view of the tool
        Returns:
        the Component

      • setEditableDocument

        void setEditableDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
        Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
        Parameters:
        edtDoc - the EditableDocument

      • end

        void end()
        Ends the edit tool. Called when the program is exited
